content: Yongsung Lee is a postdoctoral fellow of Civil and Environmental Engineering at the Georgia Institute of Technology. He studies emerging mobility services and technology, with a focus on environmental sustainability and social equity. In addition, he teaches open-source GIS and data visualization.

title: Yongsung Lee
